name: What was.
description: 2d space style game where you walk around a ship trying to figure out what happened as you seem to be the only survivor. In the far future as humanity fights its biggest and last war. you wake up in a broken ship floating in space with no clue what happened to the crew or the ship. You wonder around finding anything you can to figure out what has happened to you. an AI has been activated before the ship went down but due to a malfunction it cannot remember anything that happened. Trello link to see development https://trello.com/b/fhzjj4s8/what-was 5 dollars or more will get you a steam key
